mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Board(user_id, routine_id, board_content, board_imgUrl, board_viewCnt, board_regDate, board_updateDate, board_visibility) VALUES(#{userId}, #{routineId}, #{boardContent}, #{boardImgUrl}, #{boardViewCnt}, NOW(), NOW(), #{boardVisibility})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Board WHERE User_Id = #{userId} ORDER BY board_RegDate DESC
SELECT * FROM Board WHERE User_Id IN (SELECT Following_User_Id From Follow WHERE User_Id = #{userId}) ORDER BY board_RegDate DESC
SELECT * FROM Board ORDER BY board_RegDate DESC
SELECT b.*, COUNT(bl.boardLikes_id) AS likeCount FROM Board b LEFT JOIN BoardLikes bl ON b.board_id = bl.board_id GROUP BY b.board_id ORDER BY likeCount DESC, b.board_regDate DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE Board SET user_id = #{userId}, routine_id = #{routineId}, board_content = #{boardContent}, board_imgUrl = #{boardImgUrl}, board_viewCnt = #{boardViewCnt}, board_updateDate = NOW(), board_visibility = #{boardVisibility} WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
